snippet: The Supreme Court declared Thursday that a parliamentary committee did not have the legal power to investigate accusations against the chief justice, Shirani Bandaranayake.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court declared Thursday that a parliamentary committee did not have the legal power to investigate accusations against the chief justice, Shirani Bandaranayake.

headline.seo: Sri Lanka’s Supreme Court Rejects an Inquiry
headline.main: Sri Lanka: Court Rejects an Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Sri Lanka: Court Rejects an Inquiry
